title: Bloodrose
description: Vampire Sebastian has no desire to lead his species as the Queen desires. Instead he spends his time skirting responsibility all while skirting the police as he boasts of each new kill through his victims' social media accounts. Will justice catch up with his serial killer celebrity lifestyle? Young Prussia dreams of marrying Robert, her live in boyfriend, and living happily ever after but their naughty neighbor Lydia is making things too hard to handle. When Sebastian rescues Prussia while jogging in the park, their lives collide. Prussia plots a way to get Robert back using Sebastian but will she still want him? And by the time the Queen is done with Prussia will Sebastian ever agree to let Prussia go? Will Sebastian be able to keep his secrets and can Prussia keep Lydia at bay? How far is too far and when will secrets catch up to the point of no return? How high will the body count really be...
author: Cassidy Raindance
